topics.body:
I know it's a bit about the drama going on with sjw, anti-gamergate and such but someone made a damn good point about politics:
!http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/918/993/50b.png!

I totally agree about how there becomes a point in which the lunatic fringe becomes indistinguishable from the thing they claim to be fighting.  Potentially getting further into potential drama, but after 9/11 there was calls by the lunatic fringe by people saying that in their mind the best way to fight extremist islamic groups was to nuke the entire middle east and they were legitimately serious about it.

If someone reaches the point in which in order to fight something they become indistinguishable from what they are fighting against that makes them a extremist.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
